trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around May 31st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsSunday May 31, 2009: At 10:31 PM I went up to the living room to turn on the backyard lights for my wife returning home. After turning on the light I saw an object crossing over the house from the East traveling West. The object was about as large as a 747 and showed an odd lighting configuration. There were three bright lights in a triangle and there were lights moving from left to right flashing white, red, green and blue. I was hoping that this object would stay in the air so I could run down to the basement and grab my video camera. I telepathically asked this vehicle to please stay long enough so I could catch it on camera. I ran downstairs and got my camera and when I returned to the patio door I could still see the object although further West. I captured about 4-6 seconds of this object moving and several seconds of it at a distance. On the video you can only see a green strobe light flashing on the left and then the right side of the Triangle object. This is the first time I���ve had two sightings in two days. This object was about 1-3 thousand feet in the air. Very low in the sky. It was about 45���-50���. I also had a sighting of an object on Saturday May 30, 2009 of an object up about 40-50 thousand feet of a single object swaying in the blue sky for about 10 seconds.
